SWADEItemTables.Title: SWADE Item Tables

ItemsList.Title: Item Tables
ItemsList.Name: Configure Items to Include
ItemsList.Label: Select Items
ItemsList.Hint: Select which Items you want to use in your campaign.

HideSystem.Name: Hide System Items
HideSystem.Hint: Hides Items for the SWADE System Compendia

HideCraftingTable.Name: Hide Crafting Table Button
HideCraftingTable.Hint: Prevents the button for opening the Crafting Table from appearing in the Items Directory in the Sidebar.

SeparateBySource.Name: Separate Entries by Source
SeparateBySource.Hint: Groups Items and Actors by their source modules.

HideUnobtainable.Name: Hide Unobtainable Items
HideUnobtainable.Hint: Hides in the tables Items for which the given Character does not qualify or that the character cannot afford.

SuppressCharacterSheetRender.Name: Suppress Rendering Character Sheet for New Characters
SuppressCharacterSheetRender.Hint: When a new Character is created from the Actor Sidebar, the Character Sheet will no longer render automatically.

HideItemCompendia.Name: Hide Item Compendia
HideItemCompendia.Hint: Hides Item Compendia from non-GMs to require browsing for items via the Item Tables app.

ArchetypeTabs.Name: Enable Archetype Tabs
ArchetypeTabs.Hint: Checking this will display tabs for Archetypes in the Item Tables, Configuration, and Character Creator.

BornAHero.Name: Born a Hero
BornAHero.Hint: Checking this will enable the Born a Hero setting rule.

MoreSkillPoints.Name: More Skill Points
MoreSkillPoints.Hint: Checking this will enable the More Skill Points setting rule.

LargerThanLife.Name: Larger Than Life
LargerThanLife.Hint: Checking this will enable the Larger Than Life setting rule from the Super Powers Companion.

FreeEdge.Name: Free Starting Edge
FreeEdge.Hint: Checking this will allow all new characters to start with a free Edge.

IncludedItemsConfiguration.Title: Included Items Configuration
IncludedItemsConfiguration.Pretext: Right-click on an Item's name to open its sheet.

CharacterCreator.Title: Create Character

AdjustAttributePoints.Label: Adjust attribute points
AdjustAttributePoints.Tooltip: Change the character's max available attribute points based on Hindrances, Complications, et al (e.g., Young)

AdjustSkillPoints.Label: Adjust skill points
AdjustSkillPoints.Tooltip: Change the character's max available skill points based on Hindrances, Complications, et al (e.g., Young)

CharacterCreator.AddAncestry: You must first either drop an ancestry ability Item below or enter a name for a custom ancestry for your new character before continuing.
CharacterCreator.AddArchetype: Some settings such as RIFTS for Savage Worlds use "Archetypes" (e.g., Iconic Frameworks, Packages, et al). If this World makes use of archetype Items, add the character's archetype by dropping it here.
CharacterCreator.AddSkillsInstructions: Add skills by dropping them into the table below. You can also add them by specific die type.
CharacterCreator.AddEdgesInstructions: Add Edges by dropping them into the table below.
CharacterCreator.AddHindrances: Add Hindrances by dragging and dropping them onto the table below. If a Hindrance has both Major and Minor options, drag the Hindrance by the desired severity type from the Item Tables.

HasAdaptable.Label: Has Adaptable Ability
HasAdaptable.Tooltip: Mark the character as having the Adaptable Ability, granting them a Free Edge.

Hindrance.RaiseAttribute: Raise an attribute one die type

DropZone.Heading: Larger Than Life
DropZone.Description: Drag and drop your choice of a Major Hindrance for the Larger Than Life Setting Rule.
DropZone.Unqualified: Only characters with the Super Powers Edge can benefit from an additional Major Hindrance.

CharacterAdvances.Title: Advances
CharacterAdvances.OneAttributeIncreasePerRank: You may increase an Attribute only once per Rank.

CraftingTable.Title: Crafting Table
CraftingTable.Instructions: Drop an Item into this window to automatically create a masterwork copy of it. Select a bonus to enchant it.

Bonus.Label: Bonus
Bonus.PlusTwoArmorMinStr: +2 and Min Str decreases one die type
Bonus.PlusOneParryMinStr: +1 Parry and Min Str decreased by one
Bonus.PlusTwoFightingDamageDie: +2 Fighting and damage die increases one step
Bonus.PlusTwoAthleticsDamageDie: +2 Athletics and damage die increases one step
Bonus.PlusTwoShootingDamageDie: +2 Shooting and damage die increases one step

Mutator.Title: Mutator
Mutator.Instructions:
Drop an Item that contains Item Grants into this window to add or edit the grants' mutations.

For more information about Item Grant mutations, refer to the {docLink}.
Mutator.PackLocked: This Item's Compendium pack is locked and its mutations cannot be edited.
Mutator.NoGrants: This item does not include any Item Grants.

ArcaneSkillSelector.Title: Arcane Skill Selector
ArcaneSkillSelector.Text:
If {name} requires an arcane skill to activate powers, select the appropriate skill below. Otherwise, you may skip this step.

If the skill does not appear in the list yet, please make sure the skill has been added to the Actor and click refresh next to the list of skills.
ArcaneSkillSelector.Refreshed: SWADE Item Tables: Skills list refreshed.

ArcaneBackgroundSelector.Title: Arcane Background Selector
ArcaneBackgroundSelector.Text: Select an Arcane Background for the {name} power
ArcaneBackgroundSelector.Refresh: Refresh list of character's Arcane Backgrounds
ArcaneBackgroundSelector.Refreshed: SWADE Item Tables: Arcane Backgrounds list refreshed.

ImportSettings.Title: Import Configuration
ImportSettings.Content: Are you sure you want to overwrite the current configuration with the file's contents?

AdvanceCharacter.AddAdvance: Add an advance by dropping a skill, Edge, or Hindrance below, or increase an Attribute on the character's sheet.

Skill.IncreasedTwoSkills: Increased {name} and {name2} by one die type each.

SettingsImport.Success: SWADE Item Tables: Settings have been successfully imported.
SettingsImport.Fail: SWADE Item Tables: File is not a valid settings export.
SettingsImport.IncorrectFileType: SWADE Item Tables: File must be a plain text file.

Notifications.AddAncestry: SWADE Item Tables: {name} must be given an ancestry first.
Notifications.DoesNotHaveHindrance: SWADE Item Tables: {name} does not have this Hindrance.
Notifications.ExistingSkillUpdated: SWADE Item Tables: Existing Skill Updated.
Notifications.FlagsMigrated: SWADE Item Tables: Flags successfully migrated.
Notifications.NoAttributePointsAvailable: SWADE Item Tables: {name} does not have any attribute points available.
Notifications.NoSkillPointsAvailable: SWADE Item Tables: {name} does not have any skill points available.
Notifications.NoEdgeSlotsAvailable: SWADE Item Tables: {name} does not have any Edge slots available.
Notifications.CannotUpgradeSameSkill: SWADE Item Tables: You cannot update the same skill twice in a single advance.
Notifications.CannotIncreaseSkill: SWADE Item Tables: You've already added or increased a skill below its linked attribute. You cannot increase a skill beyond its linked attribute for this advance.
Notifications.AlreadyHasEdge: SWADE Item Tables: {name} already has the {edgeName} Edge.
Notifications.NoItem: SWADE Item Tables: No Item to open.
Notifications.InvalidItemType: SWADE Item Tables: The Item must be some form of physical Item such as ammunition, armor, shield, or weapon.
Notifications.EdgeRequirementsNotMet: SWADE Item Tables: {name} does not meet the requirements to take this Edge.
Notifications.NoAdvanceData: SWADE Item Tables: Advance {action}, but character changes were not tracked for this advance.
Notifications.LargerThanLifeMajorHindranceRequired: SWADE Item Tables: The Larger Than Life Setting Rule requires a Major Hindrance.

SWADEItemTables.Name: Name
SWADEItemTables.DragAsMinor: Drag to Character Creator as a Minor Hindrance
SWADEItemTables.DragAsMajor: Drag to Character Creator as a Major Hindrance
